title: Folding Spoon, ca. 1700–50
markings: On blade: two brass filled marks: a star and an arrow
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Oval-shaped spoon bowl, plain flat neck has small hinge and sliding band. Flat handle with trifid end, cast and chased with a deer, birds, a fox and a dog, stylized trees and acanthus scrolls against a matte background. Bowl bends forward.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Folding Spoon, ca. 1700–50.
ca. 1700–50. brass. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-259.
